name: Cassa Depositi e Prestiti s.p.a.
goal:
Cassa Depositi e Prestiti (CDP) is a joint-stock company under public control, with the Italian Ministry of Economy and Finance holding 80.1% and a broad group of bank foundations holding 18.4%, the remaining 1.5% in treasury shares.
Assets (31/12/2015): €345 billions.
CDP acts as a long-term investor with a public interest mission in financing the development of the Country, managing postal savings, providing funds for infrastructures and supporting economic development.
CDP displays a large toolset including loans, equity funds, export finance, SMEs financing.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
